entries.title: New York should pay Cuomo's legal fees in suit, judge rules
entries.description: A judge has ruled that New York state should pay former Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s legal bills as he defends himself against a lawsuit accusing him of sexually harassing a state trooper

entries.title: Jan. 6 rioter who maced Capitol Police officer Brian Sicknick sentenced
entries.description: The Jan. 6 rioter who attacked fallen Capitol Police officer Brian Sicknick with pepper spray was sentenced Friday to 6 years and 8 months in prison.

entries.title: Musk, top Biden aides meet in Washington, talk electric cars
entries.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk and top aides to President Joe Biden have met in Washington to discuss electric vehicles

entries.title: WATCH:  Couple smashes wall to rescue trapped cat
entries.description: After a repairman fixed a hole in a Nevada couple's shower, their cat was nowhere to be found — until they heard meowing coming from the wall.

entries.title: Federal appeals court hears case of hidden murals
entries.description: A federal appeals court in New York is considering whether the Vermont Law and Graduate School modified a pair of large murals when it concealed them behind a wall of panels nearly 30 years later against the artist’s wishes

entries.title: Man who claimed he had bomb near Capitol pleads guilty
entries.description: A man who caused evacuations and an hourslong standoff with police on Capitol Hill when he claimed he had a bomb in his pickup truck outside the Library of Congress has pleaded guilty to a charge of threatening to use an explosive

entries.title: Tyre Nichols case will remind people of Rodney King, Ben Crump says
entries.description: Five former Memphis police officers were charged with murder Thursday in the death of Tyre Nichols, a 29-year-old Black man who died three days after a traffic stop.

entries.title: 7 killed in shooting at Jerusalem synagogue, suspect dead
entries.description: The suspect in a shooting at a Jerusalem synagogue has been killed by police, according to officials.

entries.title: Tyre Nichols live updates: 'This kidnapping charge -- it is terrorism,' attorney says
entries.description: Updates on the death of 29-year-old Tyre Nichols following a confrontation with police in Memphis.

entries.title: Man crushed to death under outdoor urinal in London
entries.description: Police in London say a pop-up urinal has crushed a man to death in the city's theater district

entries.title: US charges 3 in plot to kill Iranian-American author in NYC
entries.description: The Justice Department has charged three men as part of an Iran-backed plot to kill an Iranian American author and activist who has spoken out against human rights abuses

entries.title: New campaign pushes colleges, universities to divest from gun industry
entries.description: Everytown launched a campaign calling on colleges and universities across the country to divest from the gun industry until they take accountability for their actions.

entries.title: Paul Pelosi hammer attack video released
entries.description: Paul Pelosi suffered a skull fracture and other serious injuries in the Oct. 28 assault at his California home.

entries.title: North Korea slams US over decision to send tanks to Ukraine
entries.description: North Korea has condemned the United States over its decision to supply Ukraine with advanced battle tanks to help fight off Russia's invasion, saying that Washington is escalating a sinister “proxy war” aimed at destroying Moscow

entries.title: WEB - LINK - BREAKING NEWS LIVE BLOG
Biden taps Zients as White House chief of staff
entries.description: President Joe Biden has announced Jeff Zients as his next White House chief of staff, tapping an experienced technocrat who headed his administration’s response to the COVID-19 pandemic

entries.title: US inflation and consumer spending cooled in December
entries.description: It's evidence that the Fed’s series of rate hikes are slowing the economy.

entries.title: Memphis police chief says video of Tyre Nichols' traffic stop left her 'horrified'
entries.description: Memphis Police Chief Cerelyn "CJ" Davis said video of the Jan. 7 traffic stop that allegedly led to Tyre Nichols' death left her "horrified."

entries.title: Protests across the Middle East against Quran burning
entries.description: Angry protesters in several Middle Eastern countries have gathered to denounce the recent desecration of Islam’s holy book by far-right activists in Sweden and the Netherlands

entries.title: UK student nurse charged with taking bomb to maternity ward
entries.description: A student nurse has appeared in a British court charged with planning to attack an air force base and taking a home-made bomb to a hospital maternity unit where he worked

entries.title: Watchdog blames Syria's air force for deadly chlorine attack
entries.description: An investigation by the global chemical weapons watchdog established there are “reasonable grounds to believe” Syria’s air force dropped two cylinders containing chlorine gas on the city of Douma in April 2018, killing 43 people

entries.title: Jerusalem, West Bank on edge after outbreak of violence
entries.description: Israel’s defense minister signaled Friday that the military would stop its airstrikes if Palestinian militant groups halted rocket attacks, a day after the deadliest Israeli raid in decades raised the prospect of a major flare-up in fighting

entries.title: Elton John concert canceled due to wild New Zealand weather
entries.description: Torrential rain and wild weather in Auckland has caused disruptions throughout the city and an Elton John concert to be canceled just before it was due to start

entries.title: EU official: Russia shifts war focus to 'NATO and the West'
entries.description: A senior EU official says that Russia has taken its war against Ukraine to a “a different stage” by making indiscriminate attacks on civilians and non-military targets, while criticizing Moscow for triggering recent moves by Germany and the United Stat...

entries.title: Man appears in federal court to face Capitol riot charges
entries.description: A mid-Michigan man says he’s innocent of the charges brought against him in connection with the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot in Washington

entries.title: South Korea extends restrictions on travelers from China
entries.description: South Korea says it will continue to restrict the entry of short-term travelers from China through the end of February over concerns that the spread of COVID-19 in that country may worsen following the Lunar New Year’s holidays

entries.title: California Bar seeks to disbar ex-Trump attorney over quest to overturn 2020 election
entries.description: The State Bar of California on Thursday filed a notice of disciplinary charges against former Donald Trump attorney John Eastman

entries.title: Biden holds White House's first-ever Lunar New Year event, in mass shootings' shadow
entries.description: Joe Biden held a Lunar New Year reception on Thursday, following two mass shootings in California that rocked the Asian American community and nation

entries.title: Why would senators not be given access to the Biden and Trump classified documents?
entries.description: The administration isn't sharing documents with senators due to concerns about potential for interference with the investigations, a Justice Department official said

entries.title: WATCH:  Polar bear slides down snowy hill
entries.description: Snowflake the polar bear is very excited about the fresh snowfall at the Pittsburgh Zoo and Aquarium.

entries.title: Kemp declares state of emergency after protests, prepares state National Guard
entries.description: Gov. Brian Kemp has declared a state of emergency and activated the National Guard in response to protests in Atlanta.
